data.lyric:
[ti:Up Up And Away (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD]
[al:Legends Never Die (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Up Up And Away (Explicit) - Juice WRLD
[00:00.46]Lyrics by：Rex Kudo/Jarad Higgins/Ryan Vojesak
[00:00.92]Composed by：Rex Kudo/Jarad Higgins/Ryan Vojesak
[00:01.38]Yeah
[00:01.91]
[00:12.94]Up up and away I can feel the walls in my brain
[00:16.51]And they're caving in
[00:17.94]Outside those walls there's an ocean
[00:20.15]I can't swim especially with all these waves
[00:24.98]I'm walkin' in Prada tryna solve my problems
[00:28.58]Through the night finding vibes Moonlight Sonata
[00:32.11]I try to deny but you see the pills in my eyes
[00:35.08]I tell her that I'm high but she don't seem surprised
[00:38.62]Walkin' in Prada tryna solve my problems
[00:41.34]Through the night finding vibes Moonlight Sonata
[00:44.92]I try to deny but you see the pills in my eyes
[00:47.93]I tell her that I'm high but she don't seem surprised
[00:51.36]Maybe I realized that my life is a ride
[00:57.83]Buckle up hold tight take a left turn right
[01:01.11]GPS don't work can't see at night
[01:04.27]So it's getting hard to drive anxiety at the stoplights
[01:07.35]Hard to think easy to cry that's how I know something's not right
[01:10.61]Numb the pain with fun times super motos Perc lines
[01:13.71]Remember that one time everything was alright
[01:18.84]Alright
[01:20.99]Oh-oh-oh
[01:23.38]Up up and away I can feel the walls in my brain
[01:26.95]And they're caving in
[01:28.40]Outside those walls there's an ocean
[01:30.63]I can't swim especially with all these waves
[01:35.33]I'm walkin' in Prada tryna solve my problems
[01:38.92]Through the night finding vibes Moonlight Sonata
[01:42.51]I try to deny but you see the pills in my eyes
[01:45.40]I tell her that I'm high but she don't seem surprised
[01:49.08]Walkin' in Prada tryna solve my problems
[01:51.74]Through the night finding vibes Moonlight Sonata
[01:55.28]I try to deny but you see the pills in my eyes
[01:58.16]I tell her that I'm high but she don't seem surprised
[02:01.77]Up up and away I can feel the walls in my brain
[02:05.33]And they're caving in
[02:06.73]Outside those walls there's an ocean
[02:09.00]I can't swim especially with all these waves
data.trans:
[ti:Up Up And Away (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD]
[al:Legends Never Die (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.46]//
[00:00.92]//
[00:01.38]//
[00:01.91]
[00:12.94]展翅高飞 我感觉脑海里的高墙
[00:16.51]渐渐将我包围
[00:17.94]在高墙之外 有一片大海
[00:20.15]我无法游泳 尤其是在滔天巨浪之中
[00:24.98]我穿着普拉达鞋子 想要解决我的问题
[00:28.58]彻夜难眠 寻找想要的感觉 来首月光奏鸣曲
[00:32.11]我很想拒绝 但你知道 我十分渴望药物的慰藉
[00:35.08]我告诉她 我很嗨 但她似乎并不惊讶
[00:38.62]穿着普拉达鞋子 想要解决我的问题
[00:41.34]彻夜难眠 寻找想要的感觉 来首月光奏鸣曲
[00:44.92]我很想拒绝 但你知道 我十分渴望药物的慰藉
[00:47.93]我告诉她 我很嗨 但她似乎并不惊讶
[00:51.36]也许我明白了 我的人生就是一场汽车旅行
[00:57.83]系好安全带 抓稳扶好 左转 右转
[01:01.11]导航系统没有用 到了晚上就看不见
[01:04.27]所以越来越难前进 停在信号灯前 焦虑不安
[01:07.35]很难思考 很容易哭泣 就这样 我知道了有些事情不对劲
[01:10.61]用寻欢作乐来缓解痛苦 开超跑 吃那种东西
[01:13.71]记得曾经一切都那么美好
[01:18.84]美好
[01:20.99]//
